column1: How can Polls be useful for my Page?
column2: Polls for your Page would enable you and your fans to gather opinions and feedback for various topics within your Page on this site. Members can create poll questions within Pages which can be answered by other members and visitors. The answers given by others for these polls are shown in attractive graphical manner.

column1: How can I create a poll?
column2:
You can add a Poll to your Page in one of the following ways:
1. To create a Poll, please follow the steps below:
a. Go to the Page Profile.   
b. Click “Polls” tab on the Page Profile. You might have to click on the “More” tab to expand the menu bar to see “Polls”.
c. Click on “Create a Poll” link from the top left corner of the “Polls” tab to create a poll.
d. Fill up the form to create a poll.
e. Click on “Create Poll”, to save the Poll for your Page.
 
2. From the “Apps” section of your Page Dashboard, click on the “Create a Poll” button and follow the steps from ‘d’ to ‘e’ in case 1 above.

column1: What are Sponsored Page Polls? How can Polls created on my Page be made Sponsored?
column2:
Sponsored Page Polls are those Polls which have been created for Paid Pages. These Sponsored Polls will appear in the “Sponsored Polls” block in the “Polls” section under Page navigation. On “Browse Polls” for Page Polls and in search results, they are marked with a “Sponsored” marker. The search form for Page Polls also has a quick filter for seeing Sponsored Polls.
If your Page is created under a Paid Package, then the Polls created for it would automatically be made Sponsored. The availability of Paid Page Packages on our site is conditional depending on the settings configured by our site administrators.

column1: Who all can create Polls on my Page?
column2: You can choose who all can create Polls for your Page while creating your Page, by choosing the appropriate option for the “Polls Creation Privacy” field. You can edit this privacy any time by clicking on the “Edit Page Details” link for your Page.

column1: How many Polls can I create for my Page?
column2: There is no limit on the number of Polls that you can create for your Page. You can create any number of Polls for your Page.

column1: I want to search for a specific Page Poll. How can I do that?
column2: You can search for a Page Poll using the detailed search box available in the “Polls” section under Page navigation.

column1: I have a Page on this site. However, the Polls feature is not available for my Page. What could be the reason?
column2:
The reason why Polls feature is not available for your Page could be that, you might have chosen a Package for your Page for which the polls App is not available. In this case, you can see if choosing a different Package with the Polls App suits you. You can change the Package for your Page from the “Packages” section of your Page Dashboard.
Availability of Packages for Pages, and their features are conditional depending on the settings chosen by our site administrator.
